channel.title: General on OkayuThonk
channel.description: Recent content in General on OkayuThonk

item.title: Introduction
item.description: About So I wake up one day and thought, joining a jam would be nice. And then I start kidnapping people.

item.title: FAQ
item.description: FAQ (Maybe) Q: It’s my first Jam, :aonaHOW: A: It’s also my first, tl;dr a jam is an event where people makes game in a period of time. at the start of the jam a theme will be announced and people will make game based on that theme, and try to submit their game before the end of the jam Q: I can’t code??? A: :RushiaKeyboard:, there’s other role you can fill in.
